MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPropertyChanged(string propertyName) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsPropertyChanged (propertyName As String) As Boolean

span.span: The name of the property.

summary.span: Uses DetectChanges to determine whether or not the current value of the property with the given name is different from its original value.

span.span: Uses DetectChanges to determine whether or not the current value of the property with the given name is different from its original value.

summary.span: Note that this may be different from the property being marked as modified since a property which has not changed can still be marked as modified.

span.span: Note that this may be different from the property being marked as modified since a property which has not changed can still be marked as modified.

returns.span: if the property has changed; otherwise, .

span.span: if the property has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為複雜的屬性，含有與原始執行個體的屬性值完全相同的複雜物件的新執行個體是不被視為不同由這個方法。For complex properties, a new instance of the complex object which has all the same property values as the original instance is not considered to be different by this method.

Public MustOverride Sub RejectPropertyChanges (propertyName As String)

param.name: propertyName
param.span: The name of the property to change.

span.span: The name of the property to change.

summary.span: Rejects any changes made to the property with the given name since the property was last loaded, attached, saved, or changes were accepted.

span.span: Rejects any changes made to the property with the given name since the property was last loaded, attached, saved, or changes were accepted.

summary.span: The orginal value of the property is stored and the property will no longer be marked as modified.

span.span: The orginal value of the property is stored and the property will no longer be marked as modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果結果是實體的任何屬性會標示為已修改，實體將會不標示為未變更。If the result is that no properties of the entity are marked as modified, then the entity will be marked as Unchanged. 拒絕實體處於已修改] 或 [未變更狀態只能變更的內容。Changes to properties can only rejected for entities that are in the Modified or Unchanged state. 其他狀態 （已加入、 刪除或 Detached） 中的實體呼叫這個方法會導致擲回例外狀況。Calling this method for entities in other states (Added, Deleted, or Detached) will result in an exception being thrown. 拒絕未變更實體的屬性或修改的不變的屬性變更為無作業。Rejecting changes to properties of an Unchanged entity or unchanged properties of a Modifed is a no-op.
